2. **Humane Society International** (https://www.humanesociety.org/) - This organization focuses on ending the abuse, exploitation, and neglect of animals worldwide. They work on campaigns, rescue efforts, and advocacy for animal protection laws.

3. **World Animal Protection** (https://www.worldanimalprotection.org/) - A global organization that works to promote the humane treatment of animals in all their forms.

4. **The International Animal Rescue (https://www.internationalanimalrescue.org/)** - They rescue animals from situations of cruelty and neglect, and work towards the protection of animals around the world.

5. **Local rescue groups and shelters** - Engaging with local rescue groups or shelters can also be a great way to get involved. Often, they have specific campaigns or events focused on raising awareness and providing care to animals in need.
